QuestData.Title: Family Heirlooms
QuestData.Description: We recently lost a fierce battle against the hozen at Moonwater Retreat.$B$BWe evacuated as many of our people as we could, but still, there were many we could not save.$B$BWe have no tokens of our lost over which to send our prayers.$B$BIf someone could go and retrieve heirlooms from the dead bodies, we could properly lay them to rest, and move on.$B$BIt would mean so much to us if you could do this, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 8 Pearlfin Heirlooms from dead Pearlfin Villagers in Moonwater Retreat.
QuestData.CompletionText: We still grieve for our fallen brothers.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. You do not know how much this means to the families of the lost.
